name: whois-xml-api
label: WhoisXMLAPI
description: WhoisXMLAPI Provides comprehensive set of real-time and historic Whois, Domain name and DNS Data

fields.name: api_key
fields.title: API Key
fields.description: Specify the API key configured for your account using the WhoisXMLAPI.

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not.
fields.tooltip: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not.

operations.title: Get WHOIS History Search
operations.description: WHOIS History Search is a tool will gives users access to complete historical WHOIS records, including domain ownership and registrar information over time

parameters.title: Domain Name
parameters.name: domainName
parameters.description: The domain for which historic WHOIS data is requested
parameters.tooltip: The domain for which historic WHOIS data is requested

parameters.title: Since Date
parameters.name: sinceDate
parameters.description: If present, search through activities discovered since the given date. Acceptable values: date in "YYYY-MM-DD" format
parameters.tooltip: If present, search through activities discovered since the given date. Acceptable values: date in "YYYY-MM-DD" format

parameters.title: Created Date From
parameters.name: createdDateFrom
parameters.description: If present, search through domains created after the given date. Acceptable values: date in "YYYY-MM-DD" format
parameters.tooltip: If present, search through domains created after the given date. Acceptable values: date in "YYYY-MM-DD" format

parameters.title: Created Date To
parameters.name: createdDateTo
parameters.description: If present, search through domains created before the given date. Acceptable values: date in "YYYY-MM-DD" format
parameters.tooltip: If present, search through domains created before the given date. Acceptable values: date in "YYYY-MM-DD" format

parameters.title: Updated Date From
parameters.name: updatedDateFrom
parameters.description: If present, search through domains updated after the given date. Acceptable values: date in "YYYY-MM-DD" format
parameters.tooltip: If present, search through domains updated after the given date. Acceptable values: date in "YYYY-MM-DD" format

parameters.title: Updated Date To
parameters.name: updatedDateTo
parameters.description: If present, search through domains updated before the given date. Acceptable values: date in "YYYY-MM-DD" format
parameters.tooltip: If present, search through domains updated before the given date. Acceptable values: date in "YYYY-MM-DD" format

parameters.title: Expired Date From
parameters.name: expiredDateFrom
parameters.description: If present, search through domains expired after the given date. Acceptable values: date in "YYYY-MM-DD" format
parameters.tooltip: If present, search through domains expired after the given date. Acceptable values: date in "YYYY-MM-DD" format

parameters.title: Expired Date To
parameters.name: expiredDateTo
parameters.description: If present, search through domains expired before the given date. Acceptable values: date in "YYYY-MM-DD" format
parameters.tooltip: If present, search through domains expired before the given date. Acceptable values: date in "YYYY-MM-DD" format

operations.title: Get WHOIS Search
operations.description: It provides the registration details, also known as the WHOIS record data, of a domain name, an IP address, or an email address

parameters.title: Domain/IPv4/IPv6/Email Address
parameters.name: domainName
parameters.description: The domain/IPv4/IPv6/email address for which WHOIS data is requested
parameters.tooltip: The domain/IPv4/IPv6/email address for which WHOIS data is requested

parameters.title: Prefer Fresh
parameters.name: preferFresh
parameters.description: If True results in getting the latest WHOIS record even if it's incomplete
parameters.tooltip: If True results in getting the latest WHOIS record even if it's incomplete

parameters.title: Domain Availability
parameters.name: da
parameters.description: 1 results in a quick check on domain availability, 2 is slower but more accurate. Results are returned under WhoisRecord domainAvailability (AVAILABLE | UNAVAILABLE | UNDETERMINED)
parameters.tooltip: 1 results in a quick check on domain availability, 2 is slower but more accurate. Results are returned under WhoisRecord domainAvailability (AVAILABLE | UNAVAILABLE | UNDETERMINED)

parameters.title: IP Address
parameters.name: ip
parameters.description: If True results in returning IPs for the domain name
parameters.tooltip: If True results in returning IPs for the domain name

parameters.title: IP Address Whois
parameters.name: ipWhois
parameters.description: If True results in returning the WHOIS record for the hosting IP if the WHOIS record for the tld of the input domain is not supported
parameters.tooltip: If True results in returning the WHOIS record for the hosting IP if the WHOIS record for the tld of the input domain is not supported

parameters.title: Proxy Data
parameters.name: checkProxyData
parameters.description: If True results in fetching proxy/WHOIS guard data, if it exists, in the WhoisRecord privateWhoisProxy schema element
parameters.tooltip: If True results in fetching proxy/WHOIS guard data, if it exists, in the WhoisRecord privateWhoisProxy schema element

parameters.title: Other Fields
parameters.tooltip: Specify fields in the JSON format to be used as Search criteria (used to determine dynamic membership) fields or as link fields
parameters.description: Specify fields in the JSON format to be used as Search criteria (used to determine dynamic membership) fields or as link fields
parameters.name: other_fields

operations.title: Get Reverse WHOIS Search
operations.description: Reverse WHOIS is the process by which users can find all domains containing specified search terms such as a registrant's name, email address, or phone number in their WHOIS records

parameters.title: Include Domain Search Terms
parameters.name: include_domain_search_terms
parameters.description: Comma separated search terms. All of them should be present in the domain name. Maximum 4 items. Case insensitive
parameters.tooltip: Comma separated search terms. All of them should be present in the domain name. Maximum 4 items. Case insensitive

parameters.title: Exclude Domain Search Terms
parameters.name: exclude_domain_search_terms
parameters.description: Comma separated search terms. All of them should NOT be present in the domain name. Maximum 4 items. Case insensitive
parameters.tooltip: Comma separated search terms. All of them should NOT be present in the domain name. Maximum 4 items. Case insensitive

parameters.title: Include Audit Dates
parameters.name: include_audit_dates
parameters.description: If true, each domain name in the output will be supplemented with the corresponding audit dates
parameters.tooltip: If true, each domain name in the output will be supplemented with the corresponding audit dates

parameters.title: Search Type
parameters.name: search_type
parameters.description: current – search in the current WHOIS records only. historic – search in both actual and historical WHOIS records
parameters.tooltip: current – search in the current WHOIS records only. historic – search in both actual and historical WHOIS records

parameters.title: Mode
parameters.name: mode
parameters.description: preview – return only the number of domains. No credits deducted.purchase – return the actual list of domains (limited to 10,000). 1 request costs 10 DRS credits
parameters.tooltip: preview – return only the number of domains. No credits deducted.purchase – return the actual list of domains (limited to 10,000). 1 request costs 10 DRS credits

parameters.title: Created Date From
parameters.name: createdDateFrom
parameters.description: If present, search through domains created after the given date. Acceptable values: date in "YYYY-MM-DD" format
parameters.tooltip: If present, search through domains created after the given date. Acceptable values: date in "YYYY-MM-DD" format

parameters.title: Created Date To
parameters.name: createdDateTo
parameters.description: If present, search through domains created before the given date. Acceptable values: date in "YYYY-MM-DD" format
parameters.tooltip: If present, search through domains created before the given date. Acceptable values: date in "YYYY-MM-DD" format

parameters.title: Updated Date From
parameters.name: updatedDateFrom
parameters.description: If present, search through domains updated after the given date. Acceptable values: date in "YYYY-MM-DD" format
parameters.tooltip: If present, search through domains updated after the given date. Acceptable values: date in "YYYY-MM-DD" format

parameters.title: Updated Date To
parameters.name: updatedDateTo
parameters.description: If present, search through domains updated before the given date. Acceptable values: date in "YYYY-MM-DD" format
parameters.tooltip: If present, search through domains updated before the given date. Acceptable values: date in "YYYY-MM-DD" format

parameters.title: Expired Date From
parameters.name: expiredDateFrom
parameters.description: If present, search through domains expired after the given date. Acceptable values: date in "YYYY-MM-DD" format
parameters.tooltip: If present, search through domains expired after the given date. Acceptable values: date in "YYYY-MM-DD" format

parameters.title: Expired Date To
parameters.name: expiredDateTo
parameters.description: If present, search through domains expired before the given date. Acceptable values: date in "YYYY-MM-DD" format
parameters.tooltip: If present, search through domains expired before the given date. Acceptable values: date in "YYYY-MM-DD" format

parameters.title: Search After
parameters.name: search_after
parameters.description: Every response is limited to 10,000 records, you can retrieve the next page by using this parameter. The value should be taken from the nextPageSearchAfter output field. All the domain names in the result are sorted by the dates they appeared in our databases in descending order. Acceptable values: Unix timestamp
parameters.tooltip: Every response is limited to 10,000 records, you can retrieve the next page by using this parameter. The value should be taken from the nextPageSearchAfter output field. All the domain names in the result are sorted by the dates they appeared in our databases in descending order. Acceptable values: Unix timestamp

operations.title: Get DNS Lookup
operations.description: Retrieves DNS Lookup for a specified domain name from WhoisXMLAPI. A DNS lookup provides a domain’s corresponding IP address from its 'A' record as well as the domain’s mail server (MX record), nameserver (NS record), SPF (TXT record), and more records.

parameters.title: Domain Name
parameters.name: domainName
parameters.tooltip: Name of the domain whose DNS Lookup information you want to retrieve from WhoisXMLAPI.
parameters.description: Name of the domain whose DNS Lookup information you want to retrieve from WhoisXMLAPI.

parameters.title: DNS Type
parameters.name: type
parameters.tooltip: Select the multiple DNS types to for the specified Domain name. All DNS records can be retrieved with DNS Type=_all
parameters.description: Select the multiple DNS types to for the specified Domain name. All DNS records can be retrieved with DNS Type=_all

operations.title: Get Reverse DNS Search
operations.description: It lists all domains that have resolved to a given IP address, mail server, or nameserver at one point in time on the Domain Name System (DNS)

parameters.title: DNS Type
parameters.name: reverse_dns_type

IPv4 Address.title: IPv4 Address
IPv4 Address.name: ip
IPv4 Address.tooltip: Retrieve lists all domains that have resolved to a given IP address at one point in time on the Domain Name System (DNS)
IPv4 Address.description: Retrieve lists all domains that have resolved to a given IP address at one point in time on the Domain Name System (DNS)

Mail server.title: Mail Server
Mail server.name: mx
Mail server.tooltip: Retrieve lists all domains that have resolved to a given mail server at one point in time on the Domain Name System (DNS)
Mail server.description: Retrieve lists all domains that have resolved to a given mail server at one point in time on the Domain Name System (DNS)

Name server.title: Name Server
Name server.name: ns
Name server.tooltip: Retrieve lists all domains that have resolved to a given name server at one point in time on the Domain Name System (DNS)
Name server.description: Retrieve lists all domains that have resolved to a given name server at one point in time on the Domain Name System (DNS)

parameters.tooltip: Select the method from the following options using which you want to retrieve the reverse dns of IPv4 Address, Mail Server or Name Server
parameters.description: Select the method from the following options using which you want to retrieve reverse dns

parameters.title: From
parameters.name: from
parameters.description: The domain name which is used as an offset for the results returned, every response is limited to 300 records, you can retrieve the next page by putting the last domain name from the response into this parameter. If the parameter is omitted, you get arbitrary 300 records. To get the first page, put 1 into the parameter
parameters.tooltip: The domain name which is used as an offset for the results returned, every response is limited to 300 records, you can retrieve the next page by putting the last domain name from the response into this parameter. If the parameter is omitted, you get arbitrary 300 records. To get the first page, put 1 into the parameter

operations.title: Domain/Subdomain Discovery
operations.description: Domains & Subdomains Discovery Service allows you to identify all domains and/or subdomains connected by hostname terms

parameters.title: Include Domain
parameters.name: include_domain
parameters.description: Specify the comma separated domain list whose domain and subdomain you want to find
parameters.tooltip: Specify the comma separated domain list whose domain and subdomain you want to find

parameters.title: Include Subdomain
parameters.name: include_subdomain
parameters.description: Specify the comma separated subdomain list whose domain and subdomain you want to find
parameters.tooltip: Specify the comma separated subdomain list whose domain and subdomain you want to find

parameters.title: Exclude Domains
parameters.name: exclude_domains
parameters.description: Specify the comma separated exclude domain list whose domain and subdomain you want to find
parameters.tooltip: Specify the comma separated domain list whose domain and subdomain you want to find

parameters.title: Exclude Subdomains
parameters.name: exclude_subdomains
parameters.description: Specify the comma separated exclude subdomain list whose domain and subdomain you want to find
parameters.tooltip: Specify the comma separated exclude subdomain list whose domain and subdomain you want to find

parameters.title: Since Date
parameters.name: sinceDate
parameters.description: If present, search through domains/subdomains discovered since the given date
parameters.tooltip: If present, search through domains/subdomains discovered since the given date

operations.title: Brand Monitor
operations.description: Automatic to track all new and just expired domain name registrations. You can monitor exact matches or typo variants to protect your brand reputation, detect trademark infringements, monitor competitors, and more

parameters.title: Include Domain Search Terms
parameters.name: include_domain_search_terms
parameters.description: Comma separated search terms. All of them should be present in the domain name. Maximum 4 items. Case insensitive
parameters.tooltip: Comma separated search terms. All of them should be present in the domain name. Maximum 4 items. Case insensitive

parameters.title: Exclude Domain Search Terms
parameters.name: exclude_domain_search_terms
parameters.description: Comma separated search terms. All of them should NOT be present in the domain name. Maximum 4 items. Case insensitive
parameters.tooltip: Comma separated search terms. All of them should NOT be present in the domain name. Maximum 4 items. Case insensitive

parameters.title: Since Date
parameters.name: sinceDate
parameters.description: Allowed dates are in the [Today minus 14 days — Today] interva. Yesterday's date by default. If present, search through activities discovered since the given date. Sometimes there is a latency between the actual added/renewal/expired date and the date when our system detected this change. We recommend using this field in your monitoring tools for filtering daily changes
parameters.tooltip: Allowed dates are in the [Today minus 14 days — Today] interva. Yesterday's date by default. If present, search through activities discovered since the given date. Sometimes there is a latency between the actual added/renewal/expired date and the date when our system detected this change. We recommend using this field in your monitoring tools for filtering daily changes

parameters.title: Mode
parameters.name: mode
parameters.description: preview – return only the number of domains. No credits deducted.purchase – return the actual list of domains (limited to 10,000). 1 request costs 10 DRS credits
parameters.tooltip: preview – return only the number of domains. No credits deducted.purchase – return the actual list of domains (limited to 10,000). 1 request costs 10 DRS credits

parameters.title: With Typos
parameters.name: withTypos
parameters.description: If true, the search terms set will be enriched with their possible typos. For example, for the term 'google', the typos might be: 'goigle', 'gokgle', 'golgle', 'gopgle', 'goglee', 'gooogle' etc
parameters.tooltip: If true, the search terms set will be enriched with their possible typos. For example, for the term 'google', the typos might be: 'goigle', 'gokgle', 'golgle', 'gopgle', 'goglee', 'gooogle' etc

operations.title: Get SSL Certificates
operations.description: Obtain a domain name’s Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) certificate and trace its complete SSL certificate chain to reveal potential inconsistencies and misconfigurations that may translate to exploitable vulnerabilities. A single SSL Certificate Chain API query provides details that can ease your security enrichment efforts, allowing you to know which domains are trustworthy and which are not

parameters.title: Domain Name
parameters.name: domainName
parameters.description: The domain for which ssl certificate is requested
parameters.tooltip: The domain for which ssl certificate is requested

parameters.title: With Chain
parameters.name: withChain
parameters.description: If true, allows you to get all domain certificates sorted from the end-user to the root one
parameters.tooltip: If true, allows you to get all domain certificates sorted from the end-user to the root one

parameters.title: Hard Refresh
parameters.name: hardRefresh
parameters.description: If true, results in getting fresh data
parameters.tooltip: If true, results in getting fresh data
